name: The Eternal Journey
description:
The Eternal Journey is a small platformer with maximum very slight touch of tabletop games. It's designed and created for the Newbies Game Jam 2022-2.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Game designed and created by  

Mr. Newbe   

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Textures used:  

ANSIMUZ - Sunny Land Forest, Parallax Dusk Mountain Background, Warped City / Warped City 2 

Iphigenia Pixels - 2D Platfrom Tile Set - Cave

Goldmetal - Simple 2D Platformer Assets Pack 

Szadi Art. - Pixel Fantasy Caves  

Digital Moons - Pixel Skies DEMO Background pack                                      

craftpix.net - FREE PIXEL ART STREET 2D BACKGROUNDS                                           

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

 Sounds used: 

Vertex Studio - Absolutely Free Music                                                               

leohpaz - RPG Essentials Sound Effects - FREE!
